SEARCH
Module org.myjtools.jexten
Package org.myjtools.jexten

Interface ModuleLayerProvider

public interface ModuleLayerProvider
This interface provides a stream of ModuleLayer that would be used to locate candidate classes for extensions. It has to be passed to the extension manager in the moment of creation (via ExtensionManager.create(ModuleLayerProvider))

Unless you are using an advance multi-layer module architecture, the org.myjtools.jexten.internal implementation of this interface suffices for most common usages and no client implementation is required.
